trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, representa um repositório de dados para gravar e ler anotações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> no repositório.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Quando um novo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>é adicionado ao repositório de sua [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade é definida para um novo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: When AddAnnotation is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: Quando AddAnnotation é chamado, seu <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade é verificada para ver se o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>já foi adicionado ao repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>já foi adicionado e existe no repositório (conforme determinado pela sua <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade) um <xref:System.ArgumentException>erro será lançado.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação para adicionar ao repositório.

trans-unit.source: newAnnotation is .
trans-unit.target: newAnnotationis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>o valor da propriedade já existe no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma âncora em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> nas alterações do repositório.

trans-unit.source: The AnchorChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O evento AnchorChanged pode ser usado para monitorar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>contido no repositório sem a necessidade de registrar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um autor em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> nas alterações do repositório.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>evento pode ser usado para monitorar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>contido no repositório sem a necessidade de registrar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados nos buffers de anotação a ser gravado imediatamente para o repositório de dados físico.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam um modelo de salvamento explícitos podem definir AutoFlush `false` e chame <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>diretamente quando apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam um modelo de salvamento implícito podem definir AutoFlush `true` para fazer com que <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>seja chamado automaticamente após cada operação de armazenamento (Adicionar, excluir ou modificar).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for de dados em buffers de anotação a ser gravado imediatamente para o repositório de dados físico para cada operação. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se for de dados nos buffers de anotação a ser gravado quando o aplicativo chama explicitamente <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma carga em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> nas alterações do repositório.

trans-unit.source: The CargoChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O evento CargoChanged pode ser usado para monitorar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>contido no repositório sem a necessidade de registrar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Exclui a anotação com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>do repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>propriedade de anotação a ser excluído.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação que foi excluída; Caso contrário, se uma anotação com especificado annotationId não foi encontrado no repositório.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados usados pelo repositório.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: Os aplicativos devem chamar Dispose quando terminar com <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, o aplicativo pode liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>para permitir que o coletor de lixo recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>estava ocupando.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: O método Dispose público chama o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>protegido `(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro `true` para liberar todos os recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar Dispose antes da última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>é liberado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não for chamado Dispose, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>recursos não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chama o repositório <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pela loja e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This protected Dispose method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Essa protegida Dispose método é chamado pelo público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>invoca o descarte protegido`(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>chama Dispose com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, Dispose releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, versões de descarte todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer gerenciados objetos que o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Dispose also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Também chama Dispose o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: Garante que <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>eventualmente será chamado para este repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call Finalize directly.
trans-unit.target: O programa de aplicativo não deve chamar Finalize diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Finalize is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Finalizar é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que desabilitado por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: Força a nenhum dado de anotação retidos em buffers internos para ser gravado no dispositivo de armazenamento subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call Flush directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam um modelo de salvamento explícitos podem definir <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>para `false` e chamar liberação diretamente quando apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause Flush to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam um modelo de salvamento implícito podem definir o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>para `true` para fazer com que a limpeza a ser chamado automaticamente após cada operação de armazenamento (Adicionar, excluir ou modificar).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a anotação com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>do repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>propriedade de anotação a ser retornado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given annotationId; or , if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação com o determinado annotationId ; ou , se uma anotação com especificado annotationId não foi encontrado no repositório.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de todas as anotações no repositório.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: A lista de todas as anotações no momento está contido no repositório.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no repositório.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> with locators that begin with a matching <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de anotações que têm <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>com localizadores que começam com uma correspondência <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sequência.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>

trans-unit.source: This GetAnnotations method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: Esse método GetAnnotations internamente usa o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>classe para pesquisar e corresponder para as anotações retornar.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: A partir <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sequência de retorno correspondentes anotações para.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have with locators that start and match the given anchorLocator; otherwise, if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: A lista de anotações que têm com localizadores que iniciam e correspondem a determinado anchorLocator ; caso contrário, se não há anotações correspondentes foram encontradas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> é adicionado ou excluído do armazenamento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto a ser usado como um bloqueio de sincronização para <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> seções críticas.

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser usado como um bloqueio de sincronização para <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> seções críticas.
